Type alias Resource<N>

Resource<N>: Meta.Resource<Resources.Collections, N>

Resource type for a given collection name

Type Parameters

  • N extends Resources.CollectionName = Resources.CollectionName

Example

import { Resources } from "@truffle/db";

const source: Resources.Resource<"sources"> = {
  id: "0x...",
  contents: "echo \"hello world\""
}
